subject: Vam pros
description_text: Hello I’m just a little worried because I have gotten everything in my order but my vam pros and I was wondering if there is a problem

conversations.body_text: Hi Yaniel Aponte,     Please provide your order number starting with SSN, and I will check the order status for you. It may have been shipped in separate parcels due to a temporary stock shortage.

SSN5727
Order #: SF6047224806072


On Sat, Jan 10, 2026 at 1:25 AM service@simsonn.com
